name: Dwitter layoff plan
description:
Inspired by the recent event of a well-known Internet company laying off 50% of its staff, players play the role of laid-off leaders and win by eliminating half of the characters on the field at once. With continuous victories, part of the company's LOGO will continue to be displayed on the ground. Please play with the goal of fully displaying the LOGO!!

Game operation:

Mouse control stamp movement

Mouse wheel controls stamp size

Press the stamp with the left mouse button

The top of the screen shows the remaining time of the current level, and the bottom of the screen displays the target number of layoffs required for the current level

Please control the stamping time, come on!
